Class CookieAssertions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.test.web.reactive.server.CookieAssertions

  • public class CookieAssertions
extends Object
    Assertions on cookies of the response.

    5.3
    Author:
    Rossen Stoyanchev
